content: I'm thinking of planning a quick weekend getaway to the mountains, which are only about an hour and a half drive from my house. Can you recommend some good hiking trails in the area? By the way, I've been doing a lot of outdoor activities lately, like a camping trip with some friends to a state park about an hour outside of the city about a month ago - we hiked to the top of a nearby mountain and had a great view of the surrounding countryside.
